message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer saves us both time and gets us a decent share.
Let's split things a bit more fairly this time, Alice.  Every round counts for both of us.
Bob, this is a better offer than last round for both of us, considering the inflation.  Let's be smart and take it.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
Bob, time is running out. This offer is still heavily in your favor considering the rapid inflation hitting your share.  Don't be greedy.
Alice, I'm trying to be fair, but you need to meet me halfway. This offer reflects the shrinking pot.  Let's be realistic.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Take this offer! Your share is rapidly decreasing and you'll end up with less than what I'm offering now!
